paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on a genetic variant in the TTR gene associated with cardiac amyloidosis.

patients.phenotype: systemic hereditary ATTR with cardiac involvement

individual_records.phenotype_details: systemic hereditary ATTR with cardiac involvement
individual_records.evidence_sentence: Genetic testing revealed a heterozygous status for mutation c.233T>A (p.Lau78His) in the TTR gene.

functional_data.summary: The patient was started on Tafamidis, and no disease progression has been observed since the beginning of treatment.

variants.additional_notes: The patient had a positive biopsy for amyloidosis and was treated successfully.
key_quotes: Genetic testing revealed a heterozygous status for mutation c.233T>A (p.Lau78His) in the TTR gene.
The patient was started on Tafamidis. Since the beginning of treatment (17 months so far), no disease progression has been observed.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the variant was clearly mentioned in the case report.
